text: nam avarkalukku (tiya) kuttalikalai inaittu vittom akave, (attiya kuttalikal) avarkalukku, munnaliruppataiyum pinnaliruppataiyum alakakkik kanpittarkal anriyum avarkalukku munne cenru pona jinkalum manitarkalumakiya camutayattar mitu namvakku urutiyakakivittatu - niccayamaka avarkal nastavalikalayinar
